mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
insert into Att_Setting_Worker(ID,OFF_WPRK_TIME,CAMPUS_FK_CODE,SIGN_BACK_END_TIME,SIGN_END_TIME,ACTIVE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME,ATTENDANCE_DAY,FK_CODE,SCHOOL_FK_CODE,TO_WORK_TIME,INITIATE_MODE,EXPIRE_TIME,DEL_STATUS,SIGN_IN_HOURS_OF_DATE,SIGN_OUT_HOURS_OF_DATE,SIGN_BIG_TIME,CREATE_TIME,SIGN_BACK_BIG_TIME) values(#{id},#{offWprkTime},#{campusFkCode},#{signBackEndTime},#{signEndTime},#{activeTime},#{updateTime},#{attendanceDay},#{fkCode},#{schoolFkCode},#{toWorkTime},#{initiateMode},#{expireTime},#{delStatus},#{signInHoursOfDate},#{signOutHoursOfDate},#{signBigTime},#{createTime},#{signBackBigTime})

(#{item.id},#{item.offWprkTime},#{item.campusFkCode},#{item.signBackEndTime},#{item.signEndTime},#{item.activeTime},#{item.updateTime},#{item.attendanceDay},#{item.fkCode},#{item.schoolFkCode},#{item.toWorkTime},#{item.initiateMode},#{item.expireTime},#{item.delStatus},#{item.signInHoursOfDate},#{item.signOutHoursOfDate},#{item.signBigTime},#{item.createTime},#{item.signBackBigTime})
mapper.update:
update Att_Setting_Worker
OFF_WPRK_TIME=#{offWprkTime},
CAMPUS_FK_CODE=#{campusFkCode},
SIGN_BACK_END_TIME=#{signBackEndTime},
SIGN_END_TIME=#{signEndTime},
ACTIVE_TIME=#{activeTime},
UPDATE_TIME=#{updateTime},
ATTENDANCE_DAY=#{attendanceDay},
FK_CODE=#{fkCode},
SCHOOL_FK_CODE=#{schoolFkCode},
TO_WORK_TIME=#{toWorkTime},
INITIATE_MODE=#{initiateMode},
EXPIRE_TIME=#{expireTime},
DEL_STATUS=#{delStatus},
SIGN_IN_HOURS_OF_DATE=#{signInHoursOfDate},
SIGN_OUT_HOURS_OF_DATE=#{signOutHoursOfDate},
SIGN_BIG_TIME=#{signBigTime},
CREATE_TIME=#{createTime},
SIGN_BACK_BIG_TIME=#{signBackBigTime},
where ID=#{id}
